Name: Brain Correlates of Math Processing in Adults
ReferencesAndLinks: Prado J, Mutreja R, Zhang H, Mehta R, Desroches AS, Minas J & Booth JR (2011). Distinct Representations of Subtraction and Multiplication in the Neural Systems for Numerosity and Language. Human Brain Mapping, 32, 1932-1947.
